meanings.definition: Not healthy; lacking good health or physical well-being.
meanings.sent1: Eating fast food every day is unhealthier than eating fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: Her habit of staying up late and skipping meals is making her unhealthier.
meanings.sent3: The couch potato joked that running a marathon would be unhealthier than watching TV all day.
meanings.sent4: The polluted city air was unhealthier than a smoker's breath.
meanings.sent5: The neglected garden was unhealthier than a desert wasteland.

meanings.definition: Not conducive to good health; harmful or detrimental to health.
meanings.sent1: Living in a moldy house can lead to unhealthier conditions for your lungs.
meanings.sent2: Excessive sugar intake can result in unhealthier teeth and gums.
meanings.sent3: The daredevil's idea of bungee jumping without a cord seemed unhealthier than eating expired yogurt.
meanings.sent4: The toxic fumes from the factory made the air unhealthier than a haunted house.
meanings.sent5: The lack of exercise made his body unhealthier than a neglected garden.
